Orion Obsidian.description: A young adult struggling with his heritage as the son of two corrupted mages.
Orion Obsidian.goals: To master his powers and restore balance to the ley lines.

Thorne Obsidian.description: Leader of the Obsidian family, dedicated to protecting Ethyrea's balance.
Thorne Obsidian.goals: To defend the Nexus Points and maintain the family's legacy.
